channel.title: Wall of Terror
channel.description:
Took me an hour and a bit to make so it's a bit rough.
Also note, it 'may' not be suitable for clients since it has a face count of 33k. Not sure what the limit is though. Mistake, i misread 3.3k as 33k. :L
This is only version one, so would appreciate your thoughts.
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/55ik9x.jpg[/img]
lower poly. [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ntus1c.jpg[/img]

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Surfr, post:30, topic:323909”]Last time i think about releasing anything, this forum is just a flame fest.[/quote]I see you can’t take the heat.
Look, if you can’t take mere simple flame like this, I’d advise you not to try and start any arguments. We were joking around in the first few posts on the first page, and when we saw 33k polycount (which I figured was a mistake after a while) we started saying stuff about it. But honestly, you don’t need to start a whole flame war over the fact dylan, one of our most respected modelers has made car and human models. Frell, another very highly respected modeler and moderator here, has also made several car models. So look, if you want to start shit over the most simplest of things, nobody will like you, you will be flamed at the simplest remarks, and you will receive zero respect and tolerance.

Welcome to Mopar.

Read full topic

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

@Surfr: Mopar is flame fest. Really, its for ppl who want the straight truth, with no sugar coating. we dont (usually) intend on being mean, we just dont want to mislead you with ‘sugar coated’ criticism.

Read full topic

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

LOL - just increase the buffer size, that’s the only reason there is any limit to the triangle count.

Nice model, triangles will probably too small though in the middle, jagex use fixed point arithmetic for the animation, so points that are sepperated by 1 or 2 unit will always join - making triangles disappear. Just needs optimizing for low poly.
9/10

Read full topic

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

Last time i think about releasing anything, this forum is just a flame fest.

Read full topic

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:28, topic:323909”][quote author=Surfr link=topic=420307.msg3088525#msg3088525 date=1262702733]

I like how you’re arguing with Dylan. Dylan’s human > this shield.

Why it has nothing to do with RuneScape? Face count. Dylan’s is closer to the limit. Yours is overboard.

  1. The face count was 3.3k not 33k, read first post i made a mistake.
  2. I’m not arguing the fact which is better.
  3. So anything that is closer to the limit is more to do with runescape than a shield. If i make a low poly imac could i post it here? Lets not forget what this forum is about.
    [/quote]

Think about this, Dylans Human, to make it functional, would be easy, because it was (or at least i had seen it at) 1.5k faces, that he got it down to. Thus, splitting that into, feet, legs, arms, body, hands, and head, would make it VERY easy to add into a client, this would not be as easy because you need to tear/combine faces until its below 2000. Sorry, but Dylans human has ALOT more to do with runescape, than a “demonic” looking shield.[/quote]

he could probably split the shield in half, not sure if that would work well, or the reduce polygons tool would help.
Note: if you use reduce polygons, sometimes you have to fix a few things as it will put a few points out of place etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:21, topic:323909”][quote author=Surfr link=topic=420307.msg3087946#msg3087946 date=1262648896]

this is DEFINATELY a waste of faces. my latest mustang was 5,000. my full human was 4,000. why has this not been locked liked my non rs capable models??\

A mustang and a full human has nothing to do with runescape.

Besides, tomorrow i’m going to replace this with a low poly version.
[/quote]
A full human could replace the current Runescape human, and at this time, the Mustang would have more to do with RS than a 33,000 face shield[/quote]

I haven’t seen your full human, i doubt either well it will fit in with runescape.

Even a 600k face shield has more to do with runescape than a car dylan… a shield made from blemonge has more to do with runescape since cars didn’t even exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

You do realize that you can use a normal primitive sphere instead of a 10,000 poly one. Nobody ever really notices it, and considering this is a model meant for rs, nobody cares how smooth a mostly transparent sphere is. I’d like you to do this instead of using your current spheres, and tell us the new polycount.

Read full topic

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:17, topic:323909”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=420307.msg3087700#msg3087700 date=1262635866]
Mehh, I don’t care tbh, if Frell has a problem with it then I can’t really do anything about it, but I’m not gonna do anything if you post a high poly model.
Unless, maybe an exception, would be if you posted a high poly model of a vehicle, car, building, etc, it at least has be Runescape related.
[/quote]
i think all types of models should be allowed.(over 2k faces,non-runescape related ect…)[/quote]

Then you may aswell just go to the Mitb graphics board? :rolleyes:

item.title: Wall of Terror
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

SilentCJ:

How long did this take you? Because 33,0000 is just ridiculous, if you made it in metasequoia that is.

Started it last night, i didn’t really take note.

I’m terrible at using materials, if the colours were sorted it would look a lot better i’m sure.
